Module com.example.inventoryapplication
Package com.example.inventoryapplication

Class InventoryApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.inventoryapplication.InventoryApplication
public class InventoryApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Application that manages company inventory FUTURE ENHANCEMENT the application could be extended to provide information about sales and production costs of parts and products
